altername_name: Game of Life, The: DX Jinsei Game II
name: DX Jinsei Game II: The Game of Life
overview: DX Jinsei Game II is a multiplayer party board game based on The Game of Life board game, and a sequel to DX Jinsei Game. It is very similar to the previous release, again based on the board game but not a direct translation of any version, and the main differences are additional content as opposed to any mechanical changes. Up to four players take turns spinning a roulette to move along the game board through each stage of their life, starting from infancy (as opposed to high school in the previous game) all the way through to retirement, with the winner being the player who gathers the most wealth. Each of the three maps this time features a theme — fantasy, travel across Japan, or the four seasons — and has a similar length. There are a large number of new events and mini-games compared to the previous release, and the game length can also be configured to allow for games as short as one hour.
